snippet: Mr. de Blasio insisted that he pressed the developer of Atlantic Yards, Bruce Ratner, to follow through on his promises to build hundreds of units of affordable housing there, none of which have yet materialized.
abstract: Mr. de Blasio insisted that he pressed the developer of Atlantic Yards, Bruce Ratner, to follow through on his promises to build hundreds of units of affordable housing there, none of which have yet materialized.

headline.main: Fact-Check: De Blasio and Atlantic Yards
headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
